name: Go! Golfing! Go!
description:
Go! Golfing! Go! is a retro stylized casual golf game with a time-slowing ability. Travel around island and try to get all the stars on all the golfing courses. Visit farm, icy mountains, beach and many more! Customize your golf ball with many skins and particles!

Features:
  • 60 levels to beat
  • 180 stars to collect
  • 6 different worlds to travel to
  • 25 skins for your golf ball
  • Customize your golf ball particles
  • 7 different music tracks
  • Banana Ball 🍌
